Episodes.Title: Ms. Knope Goes to Washington
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Aisha Muharrar
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and Andy go to Washington on business--and to see Ben and April. Back in Pawnee, Ron is in charge of the employee barbecue, and Tom and Ann pretend to still be together.

Episodes.Title: Soda Tax
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Norm Hiscock
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie faces threats and backlash if she votes in favor of a "soda tax," Ben tries to suck up to his interns after he discovers that they're politically connected, and Andy's efforts to get in shape send Chris into a depression.

Episodes.Title: How a Bill Becomes a Law
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Dan Goor
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Aziz Ansari, Nick Offerman
Episodes.Plot: Leslie is forced to make a sacrifice to assure passage of a bill, Ron meets a single woman while fixing a pothole, and Ben and April are stuck in a parking lot and can't make it back to Pawnee.

Episodes.Title: Sex Education
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Alan Yang
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie gets in trouble with her initiative to teach safe sex to senior citizens, Ron tries to help Tom overcome his addiction to social media, and Ben and April suspect that the candidate they work for is a robot.

Episodes.Title: Halloween Surprise
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie's future with Ben is on hold after he gets a new job offer, Leslie and Ann give Jerry a heart attack, and Ron's new relationship is in jeopardy because of his girlfriend's kids.

Episodes.Title: Ben's Parents
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Greg Levine
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Ben's parents ruin Leslie and Ben's engagement party, Chris becomes sad over their engagement, and Tom prepares a new business pitch for Ron.

Episodes.Title: Leslie vs. April
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Harris Wittels
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and April clash over a proposed dog park, Ben receives a slew of job offers, and Andy uses his detective skills to find out who stole his computer.

Episodes.Title: Pawnee Commons
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Alexandra Rushfield
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie wants to reject a great park idea just because the designer comes from Eagleton, Tom begins his new business venture with a new fiscal approach, and Andy and April find a way to make Andy's new security job more exciting.

Episodes.Title: Ron and Diane
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Megan Amram
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Tammy shows up at an awards ceremony to sabotage Ron's new relationship, and four of Jerry's co-workers are shocked that he's throwing a Christmas party without them.

Episodes.Title: Two Parties
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Dave King
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie's bachelorette party is ruined after councilman Jamm backs out of a promise, and Chris throws Ben a bachelor party that everyone will remember.

Episodes.Title: Women in Garbage
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Harris Wittels
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and April volunteer to work on a garbage truck to fight sexism in city government, Ron has a frightening experience babysitting Diane's girls, and Andy and Ben try to teach basketball to Tom.

Episodes.Title: Ann's Decision
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Nate DiMeo
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Ann wants to find a sperm donor, Chris, Ron, and Tom help Ben find a wedding caterer, and April replaces Leslie at a public hearing about a new park.

Episodes.Title: Emergency Response
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Norm Hiscock
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: The department has to put together an last-minute fund-raising gala for the new park without Leslie, who has been called away on an emergency disaster drill. Meanwhile, Andy takes his police officer exam.

Episodes.Title: Leslie and Ben
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Alan Yang
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: The clock is ticking -- Leslie and Ben have two hours to complete a years-long project. Meanwhile, Ron gets in trouble when his temper gets the best of him.

Episodes.Title: Correspondents' Lunch
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Alexandra Rushfield
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie discovers that a newspaper reporter has hacked her e-mail account, Ben begins his new job, and Ann decides that she wants Chris to be her sperm donor.

Episodes.Title: Bailout
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Joe Mande
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie devises a bailout plan for Ricky's Records, home to Pawnee's children's music scene. Meanwhile, Ron speaks out against her pro-government plans. Ann promises to write April's recommendation letter only if they become best f...

Episodes.Title: Partridge
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Dave King
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Ben and Leslie go to Ben's hometown in Minnesota so he can get the key to the city, an honor given to all former mayors of the town except Ben, councilman Jamm sues Ron for punching him, and Chris and Ann try to test their compati...

Episodes.Title: Animal Control
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Megan Amram
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie faces a roadblock while searching for a new head of Animal Control, Ann convinces Ron to go see a doctor, and Ben asks local fragrance mogul Dennis Feinstein for a charitable donation.

Episodes.Title: Article Two
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Matt Murray
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: A concerned citizen fights Leslie's efforts to remove some outdated Pawnee laws, and April and Ron are forced to take Chris's management training course.

Episodes.Title: Jerry's Retirement
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Norm Hiscock
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie throws a last-minute retirement party for Jerry, Tom discovers that he's the new Jerry in the office, and Ann and Chris weigh their options for conception.

Episodes.Title: Swing Vote
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Joe Mande
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: After a bill to fund a local putt-putt course is introduced, Leslie and Ron compete for Jamm's swing vote. Meanwhile, Andy decides to retire from the band, and Ann tries to help Tom break up with Mona-Lisa.

Episodes.Title: Are You Better Off?
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: A group of citizens organizes a Leslie Knope recall, Andy finds a positive pregnancy test outside Ron's cabin, and Tom considers a lucrative offer to sell Rent-a-Swag.
